mn126:3.8: kiṃvādī → kiṃvādī kiṃdiṭṭhi (cck); kiṃvādī kiṃdiṭṭhī (sya1ed, sya2ed, km, mr)
mn126:5.1: muddhānaṃ → buddhānaṃ (mr) | satthā evaṃvādī → evaṃvādī evaṃdiṭṭhi (cck); evaṃvādī evaṃdiṭṭhī (sya1ed, sya2ed, km, mr)
mn126:13.1: abhimantheyya → abhimattheyya (si, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr) | aggitthiko → aggatthiko (bj)
